snippet: France has told fellow United Nations Security Council members it intends to introduce a resolution this month that would authorize a replacement peacekeeping force in Mali.
abstract: France tells fellow United Nations Security Council members that it intends to introduce resolution that would authorize peacekeeping force in Mali to replace current contingents of African and French soldiers deployed there.
lead_paragraph: France has told fellow United Nations Security Council members it intends to introduce a resolution this month that would authorize a replacement peacekeeping force in Mali.

headline.main: Mali: France Will Seek U.N. Force to Replace French-Led Coalition
headline.print_headline: Mali: France Will Seek U.N. Force To Replace French-Led Coalition
